on reading compounds: 得【トク】profit, advantage, benefit, gain, rebirth in paradise, entering nirvana
得意【トクイ】triumph, prosperity, pride, one's strong point, one's forte, one's specialty, frequent customer (client, etc.)
拾得【シュウトク】finding (lost property), picking up
体得【タイトク】mastery, learning through experience, realization, realisation, comprehension
kun reading compounds: 得る【える】to get, to earn, to acquire, to procure, to gain, to secure, to attain, to obtain, to win, to understand, to comprehend, to receive something undesirable (e.g. a punishment), to get (ill), to be able to ..., can ...
得る【うる】to be able to ..., can ..., to get, to acquire, to obtain, to procure, to earn, to win, to gain, to secure, to attain
得撫草【うるっぷそう】weaselsnout (Lagotis glauca)
